## Vector4.Maximize() method

Returns a vector with the maximum values from the left and right vectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Maximize(left: ReadOnlyVector4, right: ReadOnlyVector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | left vector to maximize |
|  right | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | right vector to maximize |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

a new vector with the maximum of the left and right vector values
